name: Pucko
description:
Score 3 goals in this hockey-like game with great multiplayer capabilities. Challenge your friends anywhere you are. No Ads. No additional costs.

3 Multiplayer options:
• Use Wi-Fi or Bluetooth to create new multiplayer game between two iOS devices anywhere.
• Use Internet connection and Game Center service to invite friends or play with random player.
• Share the screen on one device with other player.

Single player option:
• Artificial Intelligence is ready to compete with you. It is really hard to win against computer.

Other features:
• Leaderboards for Single Player and Multiplayer.
• Easily accessible option to mute game sound.
• Keep listening to your favorite music while playing Pucko game.
• Clean and modern graphics design.
• No additional or hidden costs.
• No In-App purchases.
• No Ads.

For those who love classic gaming experience.

Enjoy Pucko game and have a fun :-)
